short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Struggling to identify which papers were cited recently on your Google Scholar profile page? If so, this extension is for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Researchers! Do you infrequently visit your Google Scholar profile page and struggle to identify which specific papers have increased in their citation count since your last visit? If so, then you are a Rockstar Scholar ðŸŽ¸

Features:
(1) Track citation changes for upto 700 papers on a Google Scholar profile page.
(2) Citation tracking synchronized cross-browser via your Google account  (if you're logged in to Chrome)
(3) Selectively clear citation updates or let them accumulate over time.

To setup the citation tracking on a Google Scholar page:
1 - Install the browser extension: 
2- Navigate to the Google Scholar profile that you want to track, and make it your Rockstar Scholar homepage.
3- Wait for the citations to roll in
4- Check back to your Rockstar Scholar homepage to determine the specific papers that increase/decrease in citation count. 
5- Clear the reported citation count changes at the click of a button, or let them accumulate over time.
